answers.answer: Im not much help but I was diagnosed very late with GD so much so that I havent even been able to see a dietician. My doctor scheduled me an induction almost a week and half past my due date and its really only to be prepared if she doesnt come on her own. I am under weekly care of a specialist with sonos every week so maybe thats why. My doctor isnt worried unless my blood pressure is bad.
Also I am 38 weeks on Tuesday and 35 years old.
I am a GD mom myself, ×3. The number one reason for an early induction with GD moms is the fear that baby will get too large for a vaginal delivery. Talk with your doctor about your concerns.
I am a type 1 diabetic.  My OB will not let a diabetic carry past 38 weeks for several reasons....trust me you want to deliver before 38 weeks
Thanks ladies, I'm just a little nervous being it's my first go around.

question: I'm 36 weeks pregnant and have been diagnosed with gestational diabetes.  My ob is saying I need to be induced at 39 weeks. Has anyone gone through this? It is my first pregnancy and not sure if my age (37) has something to do with it.
title: induction
